reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This stay was a bit of a gamble as we are much older than the average backpacker but we really enjoyed ourselves. We had a double room with shower room & well equipped kitchen & a balcony overlooking the swimming pool. Our only complaint was an odd one--the pool was too hot to be refreshing being naturally heated as nearly all pools in Rotorua! The area is packed with fascinating things to do & we wished our stay had been for 4 rather than 3 nights.
reviews.title: Had a great time

likes.liked: — The relaxed friendliness & proximity to places of interest, restaurants etc

reviews.title: Dirty Hostel
reviews.text: I travelled in NZ for a month and this hostel was by far the dirtiest. My boyfriend and I got a double that was freezing ( I don't think they turned the heat on), and had garbage under the bed. We had to share a single bathroom with several other dorm rooms so we were always waiting in line which is annoying when you have to go.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: There are several other options for hostels in Rotorua - do yourself a favor and check those out first.
reviews.title: worth a visit

reviews.text: This place was great for a backpackers hotel. They have 2 spa pools and a lovely warm outdoor pool. we visited as the busy season was just starting and found that the pools were not busy. It was reasonably priced and the room we booked had a kitchen and bathroom. The only slight disadvantage was the loud party in the next room which was loudly broken up in the early hours of the morning. But then If we hadnt had an early start we would have attended the party ourselves
reviews.title: Great, friendly, good location
